articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: 'Dhoni was just sitting there when CSK needed sixes': Ex-AUS star flabbergasted - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The Australia star expressed his shock at MS Dhoni not batting at all during the match against Rajasthan Royals on Thursday. | Cricket
articles.content: Chennai Super Kings faced a big defeat in their clash against Rajasthan Royals on Thursday night, as MS Dhoni's side dropped to 3rd spot in the points table. The Super Kings failed to chased down a 2… [+1663 chars]
